content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This training aims to show how the security team built the Vulnerability Management program in EPAM and what should be done to be compliant with company rules and policies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please watch the slides below:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"size\":669930,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d1ad5fd8-7764-48ea-a714-35c443816d37/Vulnerability Management at EPAM (educational course).pdf?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d1ad5fd8-7764-48ea-a714-35c443816d37/Vulnerability Management at EPAM (educational course).pdf?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Vulnerability Management at EPAM (educational course).pdf\",\"name\":\"Vulnerability Management at EPAM (educational course).pdf\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"pdf\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"iframe\",\"id\":\"d1ad5fd8-7764-48ea-a714-35c443816d37\",\"extension\":\"pdf\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
